arStrings.szText:
{c_important}Bone Storm{/c} and {c_important}Blood Wave{/c} are also {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills, deal Shadow damage, and gain additional effects: 
{icon:bullet,1.2} Enemies damaged by {c_important}Bone Storm{/c} take {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (1 + Owner.Main_Hand_Damage_Percent_Bonus) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds. 
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_important}Blood Wave{/c} creates {c_important}Desecrated Ground{/c} as it travels, dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (1 + Owner.Main_Hand_Damage_Percent_Bonus) * Affix_Value_1*Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Shadow damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} seconds
{c_important}Bone Storm{/c} and {c_important}Blood Wave{/c} are also {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills, deal Shadow damage, and gain additional effects.
